movie.title: Inside the Manson Cult: The Lost Tapes
movie.title_english: Inside the Manson Cult: The Lost Tapes
movie.title_long: Inside the Manson Cult: The Lost Tapes (2018)
movie.description_intro: A retelling of the Manson story using original, archived 16mm footage.
movie.description_full: A retelling of the Manson story using original, archived 16mm footage.

movies.title: The Cotton Club
movies.summary: The Cotton Club was a famous Harlem nightclub. This is the story of the people who visited this club as well as the people who ran it, and the film is generously peppered with the jazz music that made the Cotton Club so renowned in the 1920s and 1930s.
movies.description_full: The Cotton Club was a famous Harlem nightclub. This is the story of the people who visited this club as well as the people who ran it, and the film is generously peppered with the jazz music that made the Cotton Club so renowned in the 1920s and 1930s.
movies.synopsis: The Cotton Club was a famous Harlem nightclub. This is the story of the people who visited this club as well as the people who ran it, and the film is generously peppered with the jazz music that made the Cotton Club so renowned in the 1920s and 1930s.

movies.title: The Awakening
movies.summary: In 1921, in London, the arrogant and skeptical Florence Cathcart is famous for exposing hoaxes and helping the police to arrest con artists. The stranger Robert Mallory tells her that the headmaster of a boarding school in Rookford had invited her to travel to Cumbria to investigate a ghost that is frightening the pupils to death. He also tells that many years ago there was a murder in the estate and recently pupil Walter Portman had died. The reluctant Florence finally accepts to go to Cumbria. On arrival, she is welcomed by governess Maud and the boy Thomas Hill. Soon Florence discovers what had happened to Walter and then the students, teachers and staff are released on vacation, and Florence remains alone with Robert, Maud and Tom in the school. Florence is ready to leave the boarding school when strange things happen, leaving Florence scared.

movies.title: Kiru
movies.summary: A samurai seeks revenge and redemption after his family is executed by a rival clan.
movies.description_full: A samurai seeks revenge and redemption after his family is executed by a rival clan.
movies.synopsis: A samurai seeks revenge and redemption after his family is executed by a rival clan.

movies.title: The Don Is Dead
movies.summary: After his mistress is savagely beaten up a Mafia leader goes after the killer with a bloody vengeance. Soon after the hunt begins, a gang war ensues.
movies.description_full: After his mistress is savagely beaten up a Mafia leader goes after the killer with a bloody vengeance. Soon after the hunt begins, a gang war ensues.
